text: now tinoh mean ph st tang da chbasaleasa cheachraen dauchchea meak m ai pr hi m cheadaem . haey anaknea ban chaul tow tinoh ke nung mean sokh santiphap . haey a l laoh ban dak katapvokechch leu mnoussa lok aoy thveubony ha chchi nowphteah robsa a l laoh( mea kkah) champoh anak del meanolotthopheap towdl . haey bae anaknea ban bdeseth pit brakd nasa a l laoh min trauvkar aveimuoy pi piphp teangoasa laey
